item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun film has a superb 2nd Monday, remains on track to beat Baahubali 2 - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun film has a superb 2nd Monday, remains on track to beat Baahubali 2

Published on Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The second week for Pushpa 2 is projected to earn close to Rs. 300 crore, with a total exceeding Rs. 1100 crore by the end of the week.

  • Pushpa 2 grossed over Rs. 30 crore on its second Monday.
  • The film dropped just 28% from its second Friday.
  • The twelve-day total gross at the Indian box office now stands at approximately Rs. 1040 crore.
  • The Hindi version collected a superb Rs. 22 crore approx, nearly approaching Baahubali 2.
  • The film is expected to cross Rs. 700 crore nett in Hindi.
The second week is projected to earn close to Rs. 300 crore, with a total exceeding Rs. 1100 crore by the end of the week.

With strong holds in North India and the Telugu states, Pushpa 2 is expected to continue its impressive run at the box office.

item.title: Pushpa 2 OTT release: Where to watch the Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer mass entertainer - The Times of India
item.description:
Pushpa 2 OTT Release: Where to Watch the Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna Starrer Mass Entertainer

Publication Date: December 5, 2024

Source: Times of India

The anticipated sequel 'Pushpa: The Rule' has broken records since its theatrical release, and fans are eager for its OTT debut.

  • 'Pushpa 2' will stream on Netflix.
  • The streaming rights were acquired for Rs 275 crore.
  • Expected OTT release around February 2025, 6-8 weeks after theatrical release.
  • Available in multiple languages: Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, and Hindi.
“Director Sukumar’s brilliance shines through in Pushpa 2: The Rule. He masterfully balances a mass entertainer with a film rich in social commentary.” - ETimes

The movie's successful theatrical run has set high expectations for its upcoming OTT release.

item.title: Malti Marie is busy with cricket as Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas begin Christmas celebrations at LA home. See pics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas Kick Off Christmas Celebrations, Featuring Malti Marie

Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are celebrating Christmas with their daughter, Malti Marie, sharing joyful moments on social media.

  • Priyanka and Nick recently returned to the US from the Red Sea Film Festival in Saudi Arabia.
  • The couple shared festive photos with friends, including decorations and family moments.
  • Malti Marie was seen playing with a cricket bat and enjoying her meal.
  • Fans expressed their love for the family in the comments on Priyanka's post.
  • Priyanka and Nick celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary recently.
“Home (smiling face with hearts emoji).” - Priyanka Chopra

Priyanka is currently filming for the second season of Citadel and has upcoming projects including Heads of State and The Bluff.

item.title: What Nita Ambani wrote for luxury Bengaluru store after saree shopping: ‘Wonderful to be…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nita Ambani's Visit to Luxury Saree Store in Bengaluru

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Nita Ambani, the chairperson of the Reliance Foundation, was spotted shopping for sarees at The House of Angadi, a luxury textile store in Bengaluru. Her visit garnered attention as videos showed her greeting fans before entering the store.

  • Nita Ambani wore a dark blue co-ord set and was seen greeting people as she entered the store.
  • The House of Angadi specializes in handloom sarees and has a history of 600 years.
  • The store gained fame when Deepika Padukone wore one of its sarees for her wedding.
  • Nita Ambani left a note in the visitor’s book expressing her appreciation, stating: “Wonderful to be here and experience our Indian heritage.”
“Thank you Mrs Nita Ambani for your warmth and patronage,” the official Instagram account of The House of Angadi stated.

Nita Ambani’s visit highlights the rich textile heritage of India and brings attention to traditional weaves in contemporary fashion.

item.title: Ram Charan to Perform Mala Visarjanam in Dallas - M9
item.description:
Ram Charan to Perform Malavisarjanam in Dallas

Date: December 21, 2024   Source: M9 News

Telugu star Ram Charan is set to perform MalaVisarjanam at a temple in Dallas, coinciding with his arrival for the pre-release event of his movie Game Changer.

  • Game Changer's pre-release event will be the first of its kind for a top-tier Telugu star in the U.S.
  • The event will take place at the Curtis Culwell Center in Dallas, attracting a large audience.
  • Ram Charan will complete his rituals before appearing at the event.
  • He will return to India after the Dallas event for further engagements, including a significant event in Andhra Pradesh.
  • Other notable attendees will include S. J. Suryah and event anchor Suma.
“Ram Charan, who is currently observing Ayyappa Deeksha, will complete his MalaVisarjanam at a temple in Dallas.”

This event showcases a blend of cultural significance and star power, marking a notable occasion for the Telugu film industry abroad.

item.title: WWE Raw Results – 12/16/24 (Two title matches scheduled, CM Punk responds to Seth “Freakin” Rollins) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE Raw Results - December 16, 2024

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: Wrestleview

The latest episode of WWE Raw featured two title matches, intense confrontations, and a significant response from CM Punk regarding Seth Rollins.

  • CM Punk addressed Seth Rollins, leading to a chaotic brawl.
  • Bron Breakker defended his WWE Intercontinental Championship against Ludwig Kaiser.
  • Raquel Rodriguez, Zoey Stark, and Kayden Carter competed in a triple threat match for the Women's Intercontinental Championship.
“A really strong opening with Seth Rollins and CM Punk getting into a massive pull-apart brawl…” — Wrestleview.com

Raw ended with anticipation for upcoming matches including Punk vs. Rollins scheduled for January 6, 2025, as WWE moves to Netflix.

item.title: AR Rahman shares he, Zakir Hussain planned an album together: ‘I regret not being able to collaborate with him as much…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
AR Rahman Mourns the Loss of Tabla Maestro Zakir Hussain

Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

AR Rahman paid tribute to the late Ustad Zakir Hussain, a renowned tabla maestro, expressing his grief and regret for not collaborating more during their careers.

  • Rahman shared images with Zakir on Instagram, showcasing his respect and sorrow through emojis.
  • He described Zakir's influence on music as immeasurable and celebrated his contributions to Indian classical music.
  • Rahman revealed plans for a collaborative album with Zakir, lamenting that they did not work together as much as they could have.
  • Zakir Hussain passed away in San Francisco at the age of 73 after battling a chronic lung disease.
  • Prime Minister Narendra Modi also mourned Zakir's death, highlighting his revolutionary impact on Indian classical music.
“Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji'un. Zakir Bhai was an inspiration, a towering personality who elevated the tabla to global acclaim. His loss is immeasurable for all of us.” - AR Rahman

The music community remembers Zakir Hussain as a legend who transcended genres, leaving behind a legacy that will inspire future generations.

item.title: Sonakshi Sinha warns Mukesh Khanna for blaming dad Shatrughan Sinha for her upbringing: You made distasteful statements… - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha Responds to Mukesh Khanna's Criticism of Her Family

Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sonakshi Sinha has issued a statement criticizing Mukesh Khanna for blaming her father, Shatrughan Sinha, for her inability to answer a question related to the Ramayana during an episode of Kaun Banega Crorepati.

  • Sonakshi asks Mukesh Khanna to stop using her family for media attention.
  • She shares her perspective on the incident, citing that others also struggled to answer the same question.
  • Sonakshi emphasizes the importance of forgiveness and suggests Mukesh should move on from the past.
  • She defends the values instilled in her by her father.
“If Lord Ram can forgive Manthara, surely you can let go of this extremely small thing in comparison.”

In her conclusion, Sonakshi expresses hope that Mukesh can respect her family's reputation and stop bringing up the incident.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Rajat Dalal gets furious over Karan Veer Mehra as he pushes him in the pool during the 'Tim - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Rajat Dalal gets furious over Karan Veer Mehra as he pushes him in the pool during the 'Time God' task; former charges towards him in anger

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

In a dramatic turn of events on Bigg Boss 18, tempers flared during the 'Time God' task as contestants competed fiercely. The objective was to impress Avinash, the current Time God. However, tensions escalated when Karan Veer Mehra pushed Rajat Dalal into the pool.

  • The 'Time God' task involved contestants competing in painting challenges.
  • Rajat Dalal became furious after being pushed into the pool by Karan Veer Mehra.
  • Fellow contestants intervened to prevent further conflict.
  • Shilpa raised concerns about Avinash's impartiality in judging the task.
  • Tajjinder Bagga was recently eliminated, with several contestants nominated for elimination this week.
“Avinash will be there for Eisha, and Eisha will be there for Avinash. So Vivian will always be at the last.” - Shilpa Shirodkar

The competition is heating up with shifting alliances and strategic gameplay expected to influence future eliminations and the selection for Time God.

item.title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction December 17, 2024 for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Find out Astrological prediction for December 17, 2024

Date: December 17, 2024

This daily horoscope provides insights into love, health, money, and career for all zodiac signs including Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, and Pisces.

  • Aries: You will make efforts to manage matters with courage. Your social connections will strengthen.
  • Taurus: Expect family support and avoid taking risks, focusing on harmony.
  • Gemini: Better personal relationships and new income sources are expected.
  • Cancer: Exercise caution in finances, maintain control over expenses.
  • Leo: Financial gains through hard work and effective participation in exams.
  • Virgo: Improve management efficiency; a joyful family atmosphere.
  • Libra: Focus on professional relationships and travel with strong networking.
  • Scorpio: Steady approach in work and embrace learning and support from family.
  • Sagittarius: Growth in reputation and opportunities for business expansion.
  • Capricorn: Overcome avoidance of hard work; professional stability expected.
  • Aquarius: Interest in healthy living and strong focus on goals.
  • Pisces: Income generation from various sources and strong family bonds.

Published On: December 17, 2024

item.title: Naga Chaitanya says he tells Sobhita Dhulipala to speak with him in Telugu: ‘Just hearing that same texture…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Naga Chaitanya Encourages Sobhita Dhulipala to Speak Telugu for Connection

Date: Dec 17, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Naga Chaitanya, who recently married Sobhita Dhulipala, shares his desire for her to speak to him in Telugu to improve his language skills and connect more deeply.

  • Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala got married on December 4 at Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad.
  • Chaitanya was born in Hyderabad but grew up in Chennai, speaking both Telugu and Tamil.
  • He expressed that speaking Telugu with Sobhita helps him feel a deeper connection.
  • The wedding showcased traditional Telugu customs, with Sobhita wearing a gold Kanjivaram saree.
  • Chaitanya was previously married to Samantha Ruth Prabhu, and they announced their separation in October 2021.
“In our industry we meet a variety of people from different languages. Just hearing that same texture [Telugu] and having that same warmth when you speak to someone- I think it just drew me closer so much faster.” - Naga Chaitanya

This insight highlights the personal connection that language can foster in relationships and reflects the rich cultural heritage shared by the couple.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection Day 12 (Updated Live): Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer races to - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 12 (Updated Live)

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

The film 'Pushpa: The Rule' continues its strong performance at the box office, nearing the Rs 1,500 crore mark despite a recent drop in daily collections.

  • The film earned Rs 27.75 crore on its second Monday.
  • Total net collection stands at Rs 929.85 crore.
  • Exceptional opening week with Rs 725.8 crore and second week adding Rs 204.05 crore.
  • Holds highest grossing second weekend collection record, surpassing 'Stree 2' and 'Gadar 2'.
  • Potential to cross Rs 2,000 crore with upcoming holiday releases.
The film's success has been accompanied by controversy, including the arrest of lead actor Allu Arjun following a fan's death at the premiere, which coincidentally resulted in a significant boost in box office collections.

Overall, 'Pushpa 2' has established itself as a major player in the film industry, showcasing the growth of South Indian cinema on a global stage.

  • Health is good despite some financial challenges.
  • Expect interview calls if job hunting.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024: Check astrological prediction for Gemini, Scorpio and other signs - The Indian Express
item.description:
Horoscope Today, December 17, 2024: Check astrological prediction for Gemini, Scorpio and other signs

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: Astrological Insights

Today's horoscope offers guidance across the zodiac, emphasizing themes of forgiveness, opportunity, and self-reflection.

  • Aries: Back-tracking in professional affairs is necessary, but ultimately rewarding.
  • Taurus: Ideal opportunity to prove your perceptiveness and nurturing qualities.
  • Gemini: A perfect time for forgiveness, regardless of external tensions.
  • Cancer: Reflect on emotional issues; starting from the end may provide clarity.
  • Leo: Stick to tried-and-tested methods to gain respect from peers.
  • Virgo: Focus on moral and ethical actions for personal growth.
  • Libra: Preserve important relationships to enhance your financial situation.
  • Scorpio: Explore different life options with support from partners.
  • Sagittarius: Maintain perspective to navigate life’s challenges successfully.
  • Capricorn: Reorganize your approach to family and personal desires.
  • Aquarius: Address home issues while creating a positive future.
  • Pisces: Embrace the positivity Venus brings and lift your spirits.
“It is undoubtedly a perfect time for forgiveness, even if others are going all out for revenge.” - Gemini Horoscope

This horoscope encourages self-improvement and reflection, suggesting that each sign can find opportunities for growth and understanding.
